de.btobastian.sdcf4j

Annotation Type Command


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Command
    A command annotation.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String[] aliases
      Gets the commands the executor should listen to.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean async
      Gets whether the command should be executed async or not.
      boolean channelMessages
      Gets whether the executor should listen to channel messages or not.
      String description
      Gets the description of the command.
      boolean privateMessages
      Gets whether the executor should listen to private messages or not.
      String requiredPermissions
      Gets the permissions required for a user to run the command.
      boolean requiresMention
      Gets whether the bot has to be mentioned to react to a command.
      boolean showInHelpPage
      Gets whether the command should be shown in the help page or not.
      String usage
      Gets the usage of the command.

    • Element Detail

      • aliases

        public abstract String[] aliases
        Gets the commands the executor should listen to. The first element is the main command.
        Returns:
        The commands the executor should listen to.

      • privateMessages

        public abstract boolean privateMessages
        Gets whether the executor should listen to private messages or not.
        Returns:
        Whether the executor should listen to private messages or not.
        Default:
        true

      • channelMessages

        public abstract boolean channelMessages
        Gets whether the executor should listen to channel messages or not.
        Returns:
        Whether the executor should listen to channel messages or not.
        Default:
        true

      • description

        public abstract String description
        Gets the description of the command.
        Returns:
        The description of the command.
        Default:
        "none"

      • usage

        public abstract String usage
        Gets the usage of the command. If no usage was provided it will use the first alias.
        Returns:
        The usage of the command.
        Default:
        ""

      • requiredPermissions

        public abstract String requiredPermissions
        Gets the permissions required for a user to run the command.
        Returns:
        The permissions required for a user to run the command.
        Default:
        "none"

      • showInHelpPage

        public abstract boolean showInHelpPage
        Gets whether the command should be shown in the help page or not.
        Returns:
        Whether the command should be shown if the help page or not.
        Default:
        true

      • async

        public abstract boolean async
        Gets whether the command should be executed async or not. If not the thread of the message listener is used.
        Returns:
        Whether the command should be executed async or not.
        Default:
        false

      • requiresMention

        public abstract boolean requiresMention
        Gets whether the bot has to be mentioned to react to a command. This would look like @botname alias
        Returns:
        Whether the bot has to be mentioned to react to a command.
        Default:
        false
